occupation: Co-Chief Investment Officer at Pantera Capital
headline: Co-Chief Investment Officer at Pantera Capital, Co-Founder @ Eco, Co-Founder @ Augur, and Angellist Syndicate
summary:
Note: I don't check LinkedIn Messages, if you wanna reach me, email me or DM me on Twitter.

Joey started programming in Applesoft BASIC when in middle school after his dad bought him an Apple 
II GS on eBay. He studied CS in college because he enjoys being able to translate his ideas into code. He started angel investing in 2016 and co-started a top-ranked AngelList Syndicate. Joey is co-CIO at Pantera Capital, one of the largest blockchain-focused investment firms, which he joined in 2017. He is co-founder of the Forecast Foundation, which contributes to the development of Augur (a decentralized oracle and prediction market protocol), and Eco (a simple balance that lets you spend, send, save and make money at the same time). Prior to Pantera, Joey built a sound based Point-of-Sale payment system.

He is a Thiel Fellow and an Edmund Hillary Fellow. In his free time Joey contributes to Pyethereum and enjoys reading. He's also part of Founders Pledge

experiences.title: Investor
experiences.description:
Checkout my AngelList syndicate at https://angel.co/joeykrug/syndicate

I back companies with strong moats that I'd love to work on if I had more time: practical, novel things that should exist in the world but simply don't... yet. Especially fintech, biotech + healthcare, crowdsourcing, and software companies. Our first deal was numer.ai, and our next deal is for a protocol for decentralized exchange/trading of tokens on Ethereum.

experiences.title: Co-Chief Investment Officer

experiences.title: Technical Advisor
experiences.description:
Helped create NMR (code + paper)

Numerai combines the most accurate and original machine learning models from the world’s best data scientists into a collective artificial intelligence that controls the capital in Numerai’s hedge fund.

AI + Homomorphic Encryption + Prediction Tournaments + Bitcoin Rewards == Better Capital Allocation

accomplishment_organisations.title: President
accomplishment_organisations.description: My friend Christophe and I founded a bitcoin club at the 5C Consortium in Claremont, CA to further knowledge of bitcoin and provide a base for startup growth relating to the amazing opportunities available with a disruptive technology like bitcoin.

accomplishment_organisations.title: Market Neutral VP
accomplishment_organisations.description: Seek market arbitrage opportunities uncovered by fundamental and technical analysis.

accomplishment_organisations.title: Co-founder
accomplishment_organisations.description: Co-founded a political club with a friend as we realized a lot of people at our school were interested in talking about national politics but there was no current forum to do so, so we created our own club and met weekly in the mornings to discuss political hot-topics of the week.

accomplishment_publications.name: Sidecoin: a snapshot mechanism for bootstrapping a blockchain
accomplishment_publications.description: Sidecoin is a mechanism that allows a snapshot to be taken of Bitcoin’s blockchain. We compile a list of Bitcoin’s unspent transaction outputs, then use these outputs and their corresponding balances to bootstrap a new blockchain. This allows the preservation of Bitcoin’s economic state in the context of a new blockchain, which may provide new features and technical innovations.

accomplishment_publications.name: Augur: a decentralized, open-source platform for prediction markets
accomplishment_publications.description:
Augur is a trustless, decentralized platform for prediction markets. It is an extension of Bitcoin
Core’s source code which preserves as much of Bitcoin’s proven code and security as possible. Each
feature required for prediction markets is constructed from Bitcoin’s input/output-style transactions.

accomplishment_publications.name: Numeraire: A Cryptographic Token for Coordinating Machine Intelligence and Preventing Overfitting

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Top of Class
accomplishment_honors_awards.description: Award by local TV station for top student at KHS

accomplishment_projects.title: Apple I Recreation
accomplishment_projects.description: I created an Apple I computer replica of the one built by Steve Wozniak in Steve Job's garage.  Ordered individual parts (transistors, resistors, ics, etc.) online and hand-soldered them together.  A power surge in my school came through and actually burnt one of the traces of the pcb!  But I repaired it with a pencil and finally got it running and hooked up to a monitor and then I wrote games for it in BASIC.

recommendations:
Tony Sakich



Joey is one of the most impressive people I've ever had the pleasure to work with and really gets all aspects of business more than anyone I have ever met. As a developer, Joey is absolutely top notch but his maturity and personality make him an absolute breeze to work with. I've met people with decades of experience that lack the maturity, drive and quality of work that Joey does every single day, there is no person I would recommend higher to anyone else than him and he enhances any team that is lucky enough to have him.
